title.narrative: AR APL1 Urban Flood Prevention and Drainage

description.narrative: The proposed APL project, Phase A, would increase The City of Buenos Aires resilience to flooding through protection of its critical infrastructure and the introduction of a risk management approach to the government investment program. The project would focus on the issue of risk identification and reduction through prevention, mitigation, education and training.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

comment.narrative: During 2004, for the social assessment a social baseline was obtained including this topic
A new exercise to measure population awarnes will be performed in 2012. The Bank and UPEAM are working on the TORs for thisactivity.

title.narrative: Increase of real estate market values reflecting incremental improvements in flood protection levels.

baseline.value: Agreed that the economic analysis, carried out during project preparation and using the hedonic price methodology, would providethe baseline of the indicador.

comment.narrative: Values from the year 2006 were taken as the baseline in the report on evolution of real state values undertaken by the UPEAM.

target.value: 10% increase on non-built parcels and 4.5% increase in dwellings

comment.narrative: A detailed report on the monitoring of this indicator was prepared by the UPEAM and is attached in the Aide Memoire. The realestate market value in the area has improved well above target values (although the entire increase cannot be attributed to theProject).
Short tunnel: 4.7 km (completed) Long tunnel: 4.5 km

title.narrative: Basin population subject to be flooded once every two years

baseline.value: It was calculated that 85.809 inhabitants were flooded with 52 mm rainfall in 3 hrs (2yr return period). The water levels werebetween 15 and 40 cm.

title.narrative: Population awareness, preparedness and consciousness (assessed through survey)

comment.narrative: The community education center "Centro de Interpretacion Hidraulica" is open to the public since October 2006. The Communicationand Education Plan Program is yet to contracted. The survey on population awareness, preparedness and consciousness will beundertakenafter the implementation of this program.

title.narrative: Incorporation of results of studies in planning and management of green areas and urban forestry

comment.narrative: A studied was tendered and new data is already available. New topographic, soils, tree, data is available and is helping the floodmap, used as a decision tool for public investment.

actual.value: "Centro vivencial plan hidraulico" open to the public in 2009. Web page of the hydraulic plan in the City government web.Institutional video of the hydraulic plan.

comment.narrative: Although the PROCEAH was not financed under the project, some activities were performed and new objectives for the program achieved

title.narrative: Once in operation, hydraulic functioning monitored by the hydrometric sustem, show that results are consistent withthe design

comment.narrative: New sub indicators were produced by the UPEAM to obtain and measure values from model and real works functioning. The subindicators are described in the attached Aide Memorie (Dec 2011)

title.narrative: City authorities holding strategic instruments for investin in order to increase the protection of its critical infrastructure for 10 yr return period

comment.narrative: Several instruments are available. Hydraulic plan. Maldonado Basin project, Physical and mathematical models, Agreement with LaPlata National University. Measurements and instruments in the Maldonado (during construction), SIHVIGILA project, Other basinsexecutive projects development. Master Plans for green areas and urban forestry. Building and planing codes.

title.narrative: institutional organization and procedures eficiency assessed through a auto perception questionare (new indicator proposed - restructuring) instead of Emergency agencies procedures technically assesed

comment.narrative: The UPEAM has material for self perception. This new indicator will also merge the 1G indicator in the PAD "implementation ofresults of studies in the institutional organization and procedures"

title.narrative: Improvements to teh hazard map (New indicator in the proposed restrcuturing). Instead of Hazard Map publication

comment.narrative: The flood model has been receiving new data inputs. A new contract will take place durong 2012 to update all city new drainagestrcutures as well as new data gathered from the green areas study. This will increase the map precision and spatial resolution.

title.narrative: Existence of a hydro-metherological network with an adequate communication strategy.

comment.narrative: The tendering process is underway after a long process for bidding documents construction

title.narrative: Population consciousness assessed through survey (This indicator was agreed in the pad but will be removed because it is the same one as the PDO indicator)

comment.narrative: This indicator was agreed in the pad but will be removed in the restructuring because it is the same one as the PDO indicator

title.narrative: Incorporation of results of studies in future TOR for solid waste management

comment.narrative: UPEAM is working on the elaboration of teh TOR for future studies for solid waste related to urban drainage. Currently somestudiesare being performed gathering data from the performance of the short tunnel.
